title: Bajaj Pulsar N125 launch date confirmed for October 16: Expected price, features, and other details
description: Bajaj Auto will launch the Pulsar N125 in India on 16 October 2024. It is a premium commuter motorcycle with sporty styling, featuring split seats and an LED headlamp. It will be powered by a tweaked 125cc engine and come with a five-speed gearbox. The expected price is around Rs. 90,000 to Rs. 1 lakh.
